definitions.text: a meeting at which a number of athletic contests are held

examples: I'll probably see you at the meeting
How nice to see you again!

definitions.text: get together socially or for a specific purpose

examples: The lines converge at this point

definitions.text: fill or meet a want or need

examples: Does this paper meet the requirements for the degree?
meet a need
this job doesn't match my dreams
We assembled in the church basement
Let's gather in the dining room

definitions.text: get to know; get acquainted with
examples: I met this really handsome guy at a bar last night!
we met in Singapore

definitions.text: meet by design; be present at the arrival of
examples: Can you meet me at the train station?

definitions.text: contend against an opponent in a sport, game, or battle
examples: Princeton plays Yale this weekend
Charlie likes to play Mary
My proposal met with much opposition
meet a violent death
suffer a terrible fate

definitions.text: be in direct physical contact with; make contact
examples: The two buildings touch
Their hands touched
The wire must not contact the metal cover
The surfaces contact at this point
it is only meet that she should be seated first
